title: The Bachelorette: Jamie Doran 'flies to America after model insists she has had his baby'
text:
The Bachelorette's Jamie Doran was previously involved in a paternity test scandal, after an American model claimed he was the father of her child in 2017.

According to New Idea, Jamie, 39, slept with the woman while traveling in 2016, and received a phone call from her nine months later after she had given birth to a daughter.

'Jamie said it couldn't be [his child] as he had used protection, but she insisted it was,' a source told the publication.

Scandalous! The Bachelorette's Jamie Doran (pictured) was previously involved in a paternity test scandal, after an American model claimed he was the father of her child in 2017

Jamie and the model slept together while he was visiting the U.S. in 2016. By the time the woman had given birth the following year, Jamie had relocated to London.

After the woman claimed that Jamie was the child's father, the firefighter reportedly flew back to America to undergo a paternity test.

The test came back negative, proving conclusively that Jamie was not the father.

Hook up: According to New Idea, Jamie, 39, slept with the woman while traveling in 2016, and received a phone call from her nine months later after she had given birth to a daughter

Accusations: 'Jamie said it couldn't be [his child] as he had used protection, but she insisted it was,' a source told the magazine

During The Bachelorette's first cocktail party, Jamie alluded to being accused of lying in the past when he said: 'When people don't trust me, I feel worthless.'

Prior to appearing on the Channel 10 reality show, he'd boasted of his world travels.

He said his proudest achievement was 'travelling to 116 countries around the world, across all seven continents'.

A near miss! The DNA test came back negative, proving conclusively that Jamie was not the child's father. Pictured: Jamie with Angie Kent on The Bachelorette

Jamie has been branded a 'stage-five clinger' by fans due to his apparent infatuation with Angie Kent on The Bachelorette.

During a recent group date, he said: 'I've been chosen to be Angie's husband... Obviously, Angie thinks that one day we could be life companions.'

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: The Bachelorette's Jamie Doran was previously involved in a paternity test scandal, after an American model claimed he was the father of her child in 2017.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
